评论概述: Less expensive, more serviceable, alternative to "Retail Vendor" offerings
评论详情: DH writes:  I have never been involved in the medical profession.  Regardless, scrubs appeared to be extremely comfortable, and often preferable to my "Haggar Men's Classic Khakis".  Eighteen months ago I bought my first set from a local store, and paid about $45 for the bottoms.  I liked them.  Fast forward to today, and I had a need for a "new-looking" version, so I experimented with Amazon's offering:  Same brand, same model line, same dimensions.  The $17 A offering, to me, is better.  Same excellent fit, somewhat loose, yet not at all "blousy".  The fabric is now lighter, perhaps having more polyester, but I like that.  The drawstrings are improved.  I'm quite pleased and will likely buy more.

评论概述: Decent fit but feels smaller than previous versions
评论详情: I've been wearing cherokee for a couple years now and always found them to be comfortable. The pants that came with my top were definitely soft and breathable but felt tighter around the thighs than I was expecting. They held up pretty well so far and haven't really faded with washing or trying to scrub stains out which is a plus. My biggest critique is that the side leg pockets could use some of the individual divisions that older bottoms used to have. My leg pockets were always crammed with flushes, alcohol swabs, and scissors and only having the one wide pocket with no divisions makes it a little hard to stay organized

I’ve worn Cherokee scrubs for a few years now and haven’t had any issues till now. These are definitely the most comfortable scrub pants I’ve ever worn but the quality is up for question. I have 4 of this exact same pant but in two different colors. One of the pants waist string broke and now my pants won’t stay up. After speaking with the seller they’re unable to replace them.

It fits too large, and long, and the fabric has a lot polyester-like material and very little cotton making it uncomfortable, when you put it on, you already feel dirty and sticky even though you are clean and the pants are brand new.
Comfortable, very wash and wear.

I have ordered more since my initial purchase and I will order more. I like to be comfortable before anything else. If the comfort isn't there, I don't care how many pockets there is. These scrub pants have it!

I’m 6” and 165# with a leaner build. These are my favorite scrub pants and I’ve tried several “affordable” brands. Most affordable scrubs fit loose but these are closer to a comfortably tighter fit if that makes sense. There’s still room in the legs for me (not skin tight). Premium feel and an amazing price. Would highly recommend (I bought several more pairs). Pairs well with the Cherokee Workwear Revolution V-neck scrub top (I bought medium as well).

评论概述: Had to order a few to get the right size
评论详情: About a 32 to 33 waist in jeans. The medium scrub bottoms were too tight and the large regulars were just a bit too short especially when sitting. The large tall fit the best. Room for good ROM without stretching too much and has a modern cut to it (not baggy). Length is good with shoes on but may touch the floor when shoes are off for me.  Wish the left lower thigh had a pocket though and a touch on the shiny side otherwise would give 5 stars. The shine may get less with a few washes.

As you can see from the picture, the pockets are not deep. You cant put your hands in there much less a pen. A wallet will fall right now, the pens will fall out if you sit. Anything short of a few alcohol pads will fall out. First time i wore these, my wallet fell out twice before I realized it was the pants. It was a cold morning and my hands couldnt fit into the pockets at all. Also, they sag. They have a drawstring and button up feature but still sag due to the spandex material, which is why i bought them. They look clean, are flexible and soft. But you will eventually want to use the pockets and theyre useless. Plus, they sag to the point where i step on the hem, which means eventually the bottom of the pants will have wear and tear from being walked on. Id go a different collection fro Cherokee. But they are comfortable if they were just lounging pants.

评论概述: Wrong Length & Size Sent - But Still Fit
评论详情: I immediately thought - those pants sure look awful short, then saw the short tag on the pants, which I did not order. I thought I would try them on before returning & fortunately they fit well, just rather short when I am sitting down. As I was removing the tags, I noticed they were a size smaller than the size I ordered, which was rather flattering that they fit so well. So, I am happy with my new pants - but do not expect to receive what you ordered, as you may not be as fortunate as me if receiving the wrong length & size!

From first glance the product states the pants are a unisex XXS, but when delivered they were an XXS short (petite). I asked for a replacement of proper size & was shippsed EXACT same size. But as I went to the details area it states inseam is size 28.5” (which is petite) 🙄. Needless to say just check before ordering. This really messed me up cuz I needed scrubs for work this week.

评论概述: Interesting fit, would not recommend unless you now your size for this specific model
评论详情: I liked the material but the sizing was off, I was a bit in between medium and small and between regular and short. I tried going with the slightly smaller size thinking even a tight fit would be okay. However these were too tight and too short. As a healthcare worker I can have my ankles exposed which they were. This is important as the size chart has me in between and once my question was answered I was convinced short was the way to go. Big mistake!!!!! If I could I would order medium medium with navy since those looked nice. If you have never tried these on in person, I would say skip they are a unique fit

These did not fit perfectly for me being 5' 2" 122 lbs (Small/Short size) because they were just a tad bit long but, were still comfortable and looked nice (in my opinion) on my first day of work as a Pharm Tech. They were def better than the scrub pants provided to me (for free) by my company, being that they are less baggier around the calf area. I would def purchase these again if need be! Just ordered a "jogger" type one of this brand because I was satisfied with the one that i received. We'll see how that goes.. If you're on the fence about trying these out, I suggest "go for it" considering the value in price you'll get out of them. They'll be useful in your rotation for sure!
